channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 11 – Washington DC
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I only went to one per day. That's all the museums I can take :)
item.content:encoded: I only went to one per day. That’s all the museums I can take :)

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: I loved most the large streets there, and saw as many Muzeums as possible... Bon Voyage ant take care !
item.content:encoded:
I loved most the large streets there, and saw as many Muzeums as possible…
Bon Voyage ant take care !
